scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Kellie
scrape.text: I have such a hard time with deciding how I feel about some books, and this is one of those. It's very well-written, and the characters are fascinating in their way, but I just didn't like them and found their decisions disturbing on a moral level. The author hooked me with the dynamic between the two brothers, and by the time the main course was served I knew I would keep reading to find out what happened, but it was very much in the manner of one who sees something awful and just can't turn away.
